title: All the Backlist! October 2, 2020
description:
This week, Patricia talks about a couple great backlist titles including an absolutely magical book about sorcerers in London!
This episode is sponsored by The Institute.
Subscribe to All the Books! using RSS, Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or Stitcher and never miss a beat book.
Sign up for the weekly New Books! newsletter for even more new book news.
This content contains affiliate links. When you buy through these links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Books discussed on the show:
Gender Queer: A Memoir by Maia Kobabe, colors by Phoebe Kobabe
Sorcerer to the Crown by Zen Cho
